Name: Remedy
About the game: Remedy is a first person puzzle adventure game where the player awakens in a world of darkness. Guided by a mysterious orb, you are tasked with dissolving this plagued world of darkness back to beauty. Solve puzzles to unlock new abilities, areas of the map and secrets lost in the corners of time. Discover the truth behind the orbs journey and find a remedy to cure the heart of darkness within. Key Features: - A simple puzzle adventure game. Watch the open map evolve as you complete puzzles and unlock new abilities - Use the power of dissolve to reveal hidden platforms and secret areas! - X-Ray Vision: Take dissolve on the go and reveal invisible platforms and pathways - Keyboard/Controller support in game. - A small indie adventure story created by a one man dev team more info at /
